name: Combo Spells
description:
Introduction

The name of this game is Combo Spells. In it, you have to deal the highest amount of damage to the dummy using 5 spells under 2 minutes! You can move using AWD, Space Bar, create the spells using Arrow Keys, and then cast them using E or Control Key.

Little Lore

You play as this young magician who specialize in Natural Spells. She must practice for her exams at the end of this week, a battle with her master, in order to graduate to another Grade. Using her surroundings and motion, she can cast spells to manipulate the environment into attacks or support. However, you can only use the spells allowed in the tournament, leaving this a hard exam to complete.

Controls: A and D
Move Left or Right
W or Space Bar
JumpE or Control Key
Instant CastArrow Keys
Create Spells
Spells List:
  • Fireball - Release a flaming ball from gas that moves and bounces along the floor. Deals 25 Damage Per Hit.
  • Bubble Blast - Release a scatter of bubbles using water vapor, it hurts. Deals 7.5 Damage Per Hit.
  • Overgrowth - Increase the growth of the ground and create a venomous plant. Deals 0.75 Damage Over Time.
  • Boulder - Appears from the sky, somehow, and about to crash towards the dummy. Deals 400 Damage Per Hit.
  • Lightning - Manipulate the clouds to release a burst of energy upon the dummy. Deals 250 Damage Per Hit.
